document_data.caption: A map of Callidyrr showing Lehigh in the Dernall Forest.
document_data.name: Lehigh
document_data.mainbody: '''Lehigh''' was a small village located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The village was located along the [[High King's Road]] on the northeastern fringes of the [[Dernall Forest]]. Lehigh was just {{SI|8|mi|k|long=yes}} due south of [[Caer Callidyrr]] in the county of [[Talffolk]].
